title: Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric
content:

Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric Objectives

Capture Isobel alive.

Z'rell, Ketheric's enforcer, told us to kidnap Isobel from Last Light and bring her to Moonrise Towers. If we do this, Last Light will no longer be protected from the shadow curse. Report to Z'rell.
